author: andreas
content: Fortunately there always is. At the moment I even have to hold back to not buy an Olympus E-P2. There's a tantalizingly seductive set with camera, EVF and a 17/2.8 pancake lens for 635€. That's a steal around here. Consider this: EVF and lens each cost 200€ alone, thus the E-P2 effectively costs 235€. You don't even get the E-PL1 for that money. Hmm ... must not buy ... must not buy ...
